59 #ifdef TSL_DEBUG
60 # define tsl_oh_assert(expr) assert(expr)
61 #else
62 # define tsl_oh_assert(expr) (static_cast<void>(0))
63 #endif
64 
68 #if (defined(__cpp_exceptions) || defined(__EXCEPTIONS) || (defined (_MSC_VER) && defined (_CPPUNWIND))) && !defined(TSL_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
69 # define TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(ex, msg) throw ex(msg)
70 #else
71 # define TSL_OH_NO_EXCEPTIONS
72 # ifdef NDEBUG
73 # define TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(ex, msg) std::terminate()
74 # else
75 # include <iostream>
76 # define TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(ex, msg) do { std::cerr << msg << std::endl; std::terminate(); } while(0)
77 # endif
78 #endif

86 struct make_void {
87  using type = void;

91 struct has_is_transparent: std::false_type {
92 };

95 struct has_is_transparent<T, typename make_void<typename T::is_transparent>::type>: std::true_type {

100 struct is_vector: std::false_type {

104 struct is_vector<T, typename std::enable_if<
105  std::is_same<T, std::vector<typename T::value_type, typename T::allocator_type>>::value

109 // Only available in C++17, we need to be compatible with C++11
110 template<class T>
111 const T& clamp( const T& v, const T& lo, const T& hi) {
112  return std::min(hi, std::max(lo, v));
113 }
114 
115 template<typename T, typename U>
116 static T numeric_cast(U value, const char* error_message = "numeric_cast() failed.") {
117  T ret = static_cast<T>(value);
118  if(static_cast<U>(ret) != value) {
119  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::runtime_error, error_message);
120  }
121 
122  const bool is_same_signedness = (std::is_unsigned<T>::value && std::is_unsigned<U>::value) ||
123  (std::is_signed<T>::value && std::is_signed<U>::value);
124  if(!is_same_signedness && (ret < T{}) != (value < U{})) {
125  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::runtime_error, error_message);
126  }
127 
128  return ret;
129 }

136 using slz_size_type = std::uint64_t;
137 static_assert(std::numeric_limits<slz_size_type>::max() >= std::numeric_limits<std::size_t>::max(),
138  "slz_size_type must be >= std::size_t");
139 
140 template<class T, class Deserializer>
141 static T deserialize_value(Deserializer& deserializer) {
142  // MSVC < 2017 is not conformant, circumvent the problem by removing the template keyword
143 #if defined (_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1910
144  return deserializer.Deserializer::operator()<T>();
145 #else
146  return deserializer.Deserializer::template operator()<T>();
147 #endif
148 }
149 
150 
158 template<class IndexType>
159 class bucket_entry {
160  static_assert(std::is_unsigned<IndexType>::value, "IndexType must be an unsigned value.");
161  static_assert(std::numeric_limits<IndexType>::max() <= std::numeric_limits<std::size_t>::max(),
162  "std::numeric_limits<IndexType>::max() must be <= std::numeric_limits<std::size_t>::max().");
163 
164 public:
165  using index_type = IndexType;
166  using truncated_hash_type = typename std::conditional<std::numeric_limits<IndexType>::max() <=
167  std::numeric_limits<std::uint_least32_t>::max(),
168  std::uint_least32_t,
169  std::size_t>::type;
170 
171  bucket_entry() noexcept: m_index(EMPTY_MARKER_INDEX), m_hash(0) {
172  }
173 
174  bool empty() const noexcept {
175  return m_index == EMPTY_MARKER_INDEX;
176  }
177 
178  void clear() noexcept {
179  m_index = EMPTY_MARKER_INDEX;
180  }
181 
182  index_type index() const noexcept {
183  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
184  return m_index;
185  }
186 
187  index_type& index_ref() noexcept {
188  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
189  return m_index;
190  }
191 
192  void set_index(index_type index) noexcept {
193  tsl_oh_assert(index <= max_size());
194 
195  m_index = index;
196  }
197 
198  truncated_hash_type truncated_hash() const noexcept {
199  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
200  return m_hash;
201  }
202 
203  truncated_hash_type& truncated_hash_ref() noexcept {
204  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
205  return m_hash;
206  }
207 
208  void set_hash(std::size_t hash) noexcept {
209  m_hash = truncate_hash(hash);
210  }
211 
212  template<class Serializer>
213  void serialize(Serializer& serializer) const {
214  const slz_size_type index = m_index;
215  serializer(index);
216 
217  const slz_size_type hash = m_hash;
218  serializer(hash);
219  }
220 
221  template<class Deserializer>
222  static bucket_entry deserialize(Deserializer& deserializer) {
223  const slz_size_type index = deserialize_value<slz_size_type>(deserializer);
224  const slz_size_type hash = deserialize_value<slz_size_type>(deserializer);
225 
226  bucket_entry bentry;
227  bentry.m_index = numeric_cast<index_type>(index, "Deserialized index is too big.");
228  bentry.m_hash = numeric_cast<truncated_hash_type>(hash, "Deserialized hash is too big.");
229 
230  return bentry;
231  }
232 
233 
234 
235  static truncated_hash_type truncate_hash(std::size_t hash) noexcept {
236  return truncated_hash_type(hash);
237  }
238 
239  static std::size_t max_size() noexcept {
240  return static_cast<std::size_t>(std::numeric_limits<index_type>::max()) - NB_RESERVED_INDEXES;
241  }
242 
243 private:
244  static const index_type EMPTY_MARKER_INDEX = std::numeric_limits<index_type>::max();
245  static const std::size_t NB_RESERVED_INDEXES = 1;
246 
247  index_type m_index;
248  truncated_hash_type m_hash;
249 };

278 template<class ValueType,
279  class KeySelect,
280  class ValueSelect,
281  class Hash,
282  class KeyEqual,
283  class Allocator,
284  class ValueTypeContainer,
285  class IndexType>
286 class ordered_hash: private Hash, private KeyEqual {
287 private:
288  template<typename U>
289  using has_mapped_type = typename std::integral_constant<bool, !std::is_same<U, void>::value>;
290 
291  static_assert(std::is_same<typename ValueTypeContainer::value_type, ValueType>::value,
292  "ValueTypeContainer::value_type != ValueType. "
293  "Check that the ValueTypeContainer has 'Key' as type for a set or 'std::pair<Key, T>' as type for a map.");
294 
295  static_assert(std::is_same<typename ValueTypeContainer::allocator_type, Allocator>::value,
296  "ValueTypeContainer::allocator_type != Allocator. "
297  "Check that the allocator for ValueTypeContainer is the same as Allocator.");
298 
299  static_assert(std::is_same<typename Allocator::value_type, ValueType>::value,
300  "Allocator::value_type != ValueType. "
301  "Check that the allocator has 'Key' as type for a set or 'std::pair<Key, T>' as type for a map.");
302 
303 
304 public:
305  template<bool IsConst>
306  class ordered_iterator;
307 
308  using key_type = typename KeySelect::key_type;
309  using value_type = ValueType;
310  using size_type = std::size_t;
311  using difference_type = std::ptrdiff_t;
312  using hasher = Hash;
313  using key_equal = KeyEqual;
314  using allocator_type = Allocator;
315  using reference = value_type&;
316  using const_reference = const value_type&;
317  using pointer = value_type*;
318  using const_pointer = const value_type*;
319  using iterator = ordered_iterator<false>;
320  using const_iterator = ordered_iterator<true>;
321  using reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<iterator>;
322  using const_reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<const_iterator>;
323 
324  using values_container_type = ValueTypeContainer;
325 
326 public:
327  template<bool IsConst>
328  class ordered_iterator {
329  friend class ordered_hash;

331  private:
332  using iterator = typename std::conditional<IsConst,
333  typename values_container_type::const_iterator,
334  typename values_container_type::iterator>::type;

337  ordered_iterator(iterator it) noexcept: m_iterator(it) {
338  }
339

341  using iterator_category = std::random_access_iterator_tag;
342  using value_type = const typename ordered_hash::value_type;
343  using difference_type = typename iterator::difference_type;
344  using reference = value_type&;

347 
348  ordered_iterator() noexcept {
349  }
350 
351  // Copy constructor from iterator to const_iterator.
352  template<bool TIsConst = IsConst, typename std::enable_if<TIsConst>::type* = nullptr>
353  ordered_iterator(const ordered_iterator<!TIsConst>& other) noexcept: m_iterator(other.m_iterator) {
354  }
355 
356  ordered_iterator(const ordered_iterator& other) = default;
357  ordered_iterator(ordered_iterator&& other) = default;
358  ordered_iterator& operator=(const ordered_iterator& other) = default;
359  ordered_iterator& operator=(ordered_iterator&& other) = default;
360 
361  const typename ordered_hash::key_type& key() const {
362  return KeySelect()(*m_iterator);
363  }
364 
365  template<class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value && IsConst>::type* = nullptr>
366  const typename U::value_type& value() const {
367  return U()(*m_iterator);
368  }
369 
370  template<class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value && !IsConst>::type* = nullptr>
371  typename U::value_type& value() {
372  return U()(*m_iterator);
373  }
374 
375  reference operator*() const { return *m_iterator; }
376  pointer operator->() const { return m_iterator.operator->(); }
377 
378  ordered_iterator& operator++() { ++m_iterator; return *this; }
379  ordered_iterator& operator--() { --m_iterator; return *this; }
380 
381  ordered_iterator operator++(int) { ordered_iterator tmp(*this); ++(*this); return tmp; }
382  ordered_iterator operator--(int) { ordered_iterator tmp(*this); --(*this); return tmp; }
383 
384  reference operator[](difference_type n) const { return m_iterator[n]; }
385 
386  ordered_iterator& operator+=(difference_type n) { m_iterator += n; return *this; }
387  ordered_iterator& operator-=(difference_type n) { m_iterator -= n; return *this; }
388 
389  ordered_iterator operator+(difference_type n) { ordered_iterator tmp(*this); tmp += n; return tmp; }
390  ordered_iterator operator-(difference_type n) { ordered_iterator tmp(*this); tmp -= n; return tmp; }
391 
392  friend bool operator==(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
393  return lhs.m_iterator == rhs.m_iterator;
394  }
395 
396  friend bool operator!=(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
397  return lhs.m_iterator != rhs.m_iterator;
398  }
399 
400  friend bool operator<(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
401  return lhs.m_iterator < rhs.m_iterator;
402  }
403 
404  friend bool operator>(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
405  return lhs.m_iterator > rhs.m_iterator;
406  }
407 
408  friend bool operator<=(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
409  return lhs.m_iterator <= rhs.m_iterator;
410  }
411 
412  friend bool operator>=(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
413  return lhs.m_iterator >= rhs.m_iterator;
414  }
415 
416  friend ordered_iterator operator+(difference_type n, const ordered_iterator& it) {
417  return n + it.m_iterator;
418  }
419 
420  friend difference_type operator-(const ordered_iterator& lhs, const ordered_iterator& rhs) {
421  return lhs.m_iterator - rhs.m_iterator;
422  }
423 
424  private:
425  iterator m_iterator;
426  };
427 
428 
429 private:
430  using bucket_entry = tsl::detail_ordered_hash::bucket_entry<IndexType>;
431 
432  using buckets_container_allocator = typename
433  std::allocator_traits<allocator_type>::template rebind_alloc<bucket_entry>;
434 
435  using buckets_container_type = std::vector<bucket_entry, buckets_container_allocator>;
436 
437 
438  using truncated_hash_type = typename bucket_entry::truncated_hash_type;
439  using index_type = typename bucket_entry::index_type;
440 
441 public:
442  ordered_hash(size_type bucket_count,
443  const Hash& hash,
444  const KeyEqual& equal,
445  const Allocator& alloc,
446  float max_load_factor): Hash(hash),
447  KeyEqual(equal),
448  m_buckets_data(alloc),
449  m_buckets(static_empty_bucket_ptr()),
450  m_hash_mask(0),
451  m_values(alloc),
452  m_grow_on_next_insert(false)
453  {
454  if(bucket_count > max_bucket_count()) {
455  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::length_error, "The map exceeds its maximum size.");
456  }
457 
458  if(bucket_count > 0) {
459  bucket_count = round_up_to_power_of_two(bucket_count);
460 
461  m_buckets_data.resize(bucket_count);
462  m_buckets = m_buckets_data.data(),
463  m_hash_mask = bucket_count - 1;
464  }
465 
466  this->max_load_factor(max_load_factor);
467  }
468 
469  ordered_hash(const ordered_hash& other): Hash(other),
470  KeyEqual(other),
471  m_buckets_data(other.m_buckets_data),
472  m_buckets(m_buckets_data.empty()?static_empty_bucket_ptr():
473  m_buckets_data.data()),
474  m_hash_mask(other.m_hash_mask),
475  m_values(other.m_values),
476  m_load_threshold(other.m_load_threshold),
477  m_max_load_factor(other.m_max_load_factor),
478  m_grow_on_next_insert(other.m_grow_on_next_insert)
479  {
480  }
481 
482  ordered_hash(ordered_hash&& other) noexcept(std::is_nothrow_move_constructible<Hash>::value &&
483  std::is_nothrow_move_constructible<KeyEqual>::value &&
484  std::is_nothrow_move_constructible<buckets_container_type>::value &&
485  std::is_nothrow_move_constructible<values_container_type>::value)
486  : Hash(std::move(static_cast<Hash&>(other))),
487  KeyEqual(std::move(static_cast<KeyEqual&>(other))),
488  m_buckets_data(std::move(other.m_buckets_data)),
489  m_buckets(m_buckets_data.empty()?static_empty_bucket_ptr():
490  m_buckets_data.data()),
491  m_hash_mask(other.m_hash_mask),
492  m_values(std::move(other.m_values)),
493  m_load_threshold(other.m_load_threshold),
494  m_max_load_factor(other.m_max_load_factor),
495  m_grow_on_next_insert(other.m_grow_on_next_insert)
496  {
497  other.m_buckets_data.clear();
498  other.m_buckets = static_empty_bucket_ptr();
499  other.m_hash_mask = 0;
500  other.m_values.clear();
501  other.m_load_threshold = 0;
502  other.m_grow_on_next_insert = false;
503  }
504 
505  ordered_hash& operator=(const ordered_hash& other) {
506  if(&other != this) {
507  Hash::operator=(other);
508  KeyEqual::operator=(other);
509 
510  m_buckets_data = other.m_buckets_data;
511  m_buckets = m_buckets_data.empty()?static_empty_bucket_ptr():
512  m_buckets_data.data();
513 
514  m_hash_mask = other.m_hash_mask;
515  m_values = other.m_values;
516  m_load_threshold = other.m_load_threshold;
517  m_max_load_factor = other.m_max_load_factor;
518  m_grow_on_next_insert = other.m_grow_on_next_insert;
519  }
520 
521  return *this;
522  }
523 
524  ordered_hash& operator=(ordered_hash&& other) {
525  other.swap(*this);
526  other.clear();
527 
528  return *this;
529  }

532  return m_values.get_allocator();

589  /*
590  * Capacity
591  */
592  bool empty() const noexcept {
593  return m_values.empty();
594  }
595 
596  size_type size() const noexcept {
597  return m_values.size();
598  }
599 
600  size_type max_size() const noexcept {
601  return std::min(bucket_entry::max_size(), m_values.max_size());
602  }
603 
604 
605  /*
606  * Modifiers
607  */
608  void clear() noexcept {
609  for(auto& bucket: m_buckets_data) {
610  bucket.clear();
611  }
612 
613  m_values.clear();
614  m_grow_on_next_insert = false;
615  }
616 
617  template<typename P>
618  std::pair<iterator, bool> insert(P&& value) {
619  return insert_impl(KeySelect()(value), std::forward<P>(value));
620  }
621 
622  template<typename P>
623  iterator insert_hint(const_iterator hint, P&& value) {
624  if(hint != cend() && compare_keys(KeySelect()(*hint), KeySelect()(value))) {
625  return mutable_iterator(hint);
626  }
627 
628  return insert(std::forward<P>(value)).first;
629  }
630 
631  template<class InputIt>
632  void insert(InputIt first, InputIt last) {
633  if(std::is_base_of<std::forward_iterator_tag,
634  typename std::iterator_traits<InputIt>::iterator_category>::value)
635  {
636  const auto nb_elements_insert = std::distance(first, last);
637  const size_type nb_free_buckets = m_load_threshold - size();
638  tsl_oh_assert(m_load_threshold >= size());
639 
640  if(nb_elements_insert > 0 && nb_free_buckets < size_type(nb_elements_insert)) {
641  reserve(size() + size_type(nb_elements_insert));
642  }
643  }
644 
645  for(; first != last; ++first) {
646  insert(*first);
647  }
648  }
649 
650 
651 
652  template<class K, class M>
653  std::pair<iterator, bool> insert_or_assign(K&& key, M&& value) {
654  auto it = try_emplace(std::forward<K>(key), std::forward<M>(value));
655  if(!it.second) {
656  it.first.value() = std::forward<M>(value);
657  }
658 
659  return it;
660  }
661 
662  template<class K, class M>
663  iterator insert_or_assign(const_iterator hint, K&& key, M&& obj) {
664  if(hint != cend() && compare_keys(KeySelect()(*hint), key)) {
665  auto it = mutable_iterator(hint);
666  it.value() = std::forward<M>(obj);
667 
668  return it;
669  }
670 
671  return insert_or_assign(std::forward<K>(key), std::forward<M>(obj)).first;
672  }
673 
674 
675 
676  template<class... Args>
677  std::pair<iterator, bool> emplace(Args&&... args) {
678  return insert(value_type(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
679  }
680 
681  template<class... Args>
682  iterator emplace_hint(const_iterator hint, Args&&... args) {
683  return insert_hint(hint, value_type(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
684  }
685 
686 
687 
688  template<class K, class... Args>
689  std::pair<iterator, bool> try_emplace(K&& key, Args&&... value_args) {
690  return insert_impl(key, std::piecewise_construct,
691  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<K>(key)),
692  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<Args>(value_args)...));
693  }
694 
695  template<class K, class... Args>
696  iterator try_emplace_hint(const_iterator hint, K&& key, Args&&... args) {
697  if(hint != cend() && compare_keys(KeySelect()(*hint), key)) {
698  return mutable_iterator(hint);
699  }
700 
701  return try_emplace(std::forward<K>(key), std::forward<Args>(args)...).first;
702  }
703 
704 
705 
710  iterator erase(iterator pos) {
711  return erase(const_iterator(pos));
712  }
713 
714  iterator erase(const_iterator pos) {
715  tsl_oh_assert(pos != cend());
716 
717  const std::size_t index_erase = iterator_to_index(pos);
718 
719  auto it_bucket = find_key(pos.key(), hash_key(pos.key()));
720  tsl_oh_assert(it_bucket != m_buckets_data.end());
721 
722  erase_value_from_bucket(it_bucket);
723 
724  /*
725  * One element was removed from m_values, due to the left shift the next element
726  * is now at the position of the previous element (or end if none).
727  */
728  return begin() + index_erase;
729  }
730 
731  iterator erase(const_iterator first, const_iterator last) {
732  if(first == last) {
733  return mutable_iterator(first);
734  }
735 
736  tsl_oh_assert(std::distance(first, last) > 0);
737  const std::size_t start_index = iterator_to_index(first);
738  const std::size_t nb_values = std::size_t(std::distance(first, last));
739  const std::size_t end_index = start_index + nb_values;
740 
741  // Delete all values
742 #ifdef TSL_OH_NO_CONTAINER_ERASE_CONST_ITERATOR
743  auto next_it = m_values.erase(mutable_iterator(first).m_iterator, mutable_iterator(last).m_iterator);
744 #else
745  auto next_it = m_values.erase(first.m_iterator, last.m_iterator);
746 #endif
747 
748  /*
749  * Mark the buckets corresponding to the values as empty and do a backward shift.
750  *
751  * Also, the erase operation on m_values has shifted all the values on the right of last.m_iterator.
752  * Adapt the indexes for these values.
753  */
754  std::size_t ibucket = 0;
755  while(ibucket < m_buckets_data.size()) {
756  if(m_buckets[ibucket].empty()) {
757  ibucket++;
758  }
759  else if(m_buckets[ibucket].index() >= start_index && m_buckets[ibucket].index() < end_index) {
760  m_buckets[ibucket].clear();
761  backward_shift(ibucket);
762  // Don't increment ibucket, backward_shift may have replaced current bucket.
763  }
764  else if(m_buckets[ibucket].index() >= end_index) {
765  m_buckets[ibucket].set_index(index_type(m_buckets[ibucket].index() - nb_values));
766  ibucket++;
767  }
768  else {
769  ibucket++;
770  }
771  }
772 
773  return iterator(next_it);
774  }
775 
776 
777  template<class K>
778  size_type erase(const K& key) {
779  return erase(key, hash_key(key));
780  }
781 
782  template<class K>
783  size_type erase(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
784  return erase_impl(key, hash);
785  }
786 
787  void swap(ordered_hash& other) {
788  using std::swap;
789 
790  swap(static_cast<Hash&>(*this), static_cast<Hash&>(other));
791  swap(static_cast<KeyEqual&>(*this), static_cast<KeyEqual&>(other));
792  swap(m_buckets_data, other.m_buckets_data);
793  swap(m_buckets, other.m_buckets);
794  swap(m_hash_mask, other.m_hash_mask);
795  swap(m_values, other.m_values);
796  swap(m_load_threshold, other.m_load_threshold);
797  swap(m_max_load_factor, other.m_max_load_factor);
798  swap(m_grow_on_next_insert, other.m_grow_on_next_insert);
799  }
800 
801 
802 
803 
804  /*
805  * Lookup
806  */
807  template<class K, class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
808  typename U::value_type& at(const K& key) {
809  return at(key, hash_key(key));
810  }
811 
812  template<class K, class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
813  typename U::value_type& at(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
814  return const_cast<typename U::value_type&>(static_cast<const ordered_hash*>(this)->at(key, hash));
815  }
816 
817  template<class K, class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
818  const typename U::value_type& at(const K& key) const {
819  return at(key, hash_key(key));
820  }
821 
822  template<class K, class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
823  const typename U::value_type& at(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
824  auto it = find(key, hash);
825  if(it != end()) {
826  return it.value();
827  }
828  else {
829  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::out_of_range, "Couldn't find the key.");
830  }
831  }
832 
833 
834  template<class K, class U = ValueSelect, typename std::enable_if<has_mapped_type<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
835  typename U::value_type& operator[](K&& key) {
836  return try_emplace(std::forward<K>(key)).first.value();
837  }
838 
839 
840  template<class K>
841  size_type count(const K& key) const {
842  return count(key, hash_key(key));
843  }
844 
845  template<class K>
846  size_type count(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
847  if(find(key, hash) == cend()) {
848  return 0;
849  }
850  else {
851  return 1;
852  }
853  }
854 
855  template<class K>
856  iterator find(const K& key) {
857  return find(key, hash_key(key));
858  }
859 
860  template<class K>
861  iterator find(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
862  auto it_bucket = find_key(key, hash);
863  return (it_bucket != m_buckets_data.end())?iterator(m_values.begin() + it_bucket->index()):end();
864  }
865 
866  template<class K>
867  const_iterator find(const K& key) const {
868  return find(key, hash_key(key));
869  }
870 
871  template<class K>
872  const_iterator find(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
873  auto it_bucket = find_key(key, hash);
874  return (it_bucket != m_buckets_data.cend())?const_iterator(m_values.begin() + it_bucket->index()):end();
875  }
876 
877 
878  template<class K>
879  bool contains(const K& key) const {
880  return contains(key, hash_key(key));
881  }
882 
883  template<class K>
884  bool contains(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
885  return find(key, hash) != cend();
886  }
887 
888 
889  template<class K>
890  std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(const K& key) {
891  return equal_range(key, hash_key(key));
892  }
893 
894  template<class K>
895  std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
896  iterator it = find(key, hash);
897  return std::make_pair(it, (it == end())?it:std::next(it));
898  }
899 
900  template<class K>
901  std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(const K& key) const {
902  return equal_range(key, hash_key(key));
903  }
904 
905  template<class K>
906  std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
907  const_iterator it = find(key, hash);
908  return std::make_pair(it, (it == cend())?it:std::next(it));
909  }
910 
911 
912  /*
913  * Bucket interface
914  */
915  size_type bucket_count() const {
916  return m_buckets_data.size();
917  }
918 
919  size_type max_bucket_count() const {
920  return m_buckets_data.max_size();
921  }
922 
923  /*
924  * Hash policy
925  */
926  float load_factor() const {
927  if(bucket_count() == 0) {
928  return 0;
929  }
930 
931  return float(size())/float(bucket_count());
932  }
933 
934  float max_load_factor() const {
935  return m_max_load_factor;
936  }
937 
938  void max_load_factor(float ml) {
939  m_max_load_factor = clamp(ml, float(MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MINIMUM),
940  float(MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MAXIMUM));
941 
942  m_max_load_factor = ml;
943  m_load_threshold = size_type(float(bucket_count())*m_max_load_factor);
944  }
945 
946  void rehash(size_type count) {
947  count = std::max(count, size_type(std::ceil(float(size())/max_load_factor())));
948  rehash_impl(count);
949  }
950 
951  void reserve(size_type count) {
952  reserve_space_for_values(count);
953 
954  count = size_type(std::ceil(float(count)/max_load_factor()));
955  rehash(count);
956  }
957 
958 
959  /*
960  * Observers
961  */
962  hasher hash_function() const {
963  return static_cast<const Hash&>(*this);
964  }
965 
966  key_equal key_eq() const {
967  return static_cast<const KeyEqual&>(*this);
968  }
969 
970 
971  /*
972  * Other
973  */
974  iterator mutable_iterator(const_iterator pos) {
975  return iterator(m_values.begin() + iterator_to_index(pos));
976  }
977 
978  iterator nth(size_type index) {
979  tsl_oh_assert(index <= size());
980  return iterator(m_values.begin() + index);
981  }
982 
983  const_iterator nth(size_type index) const {
984  tsl_oh_assert(index <= size());
985  return const_iterator(m_values.cbegin() + index);
986  }
987 
988  const_reference front() const {
989  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
990  return m_values.front();
991  }
992 
993  const_reference back() const {
994  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
995  return m_values.back();
996  }
997 
998  const values_container_type& values_container() const noexcept {
999  return m_values;
1000  }
1001 
1002  template<class U = values_container_type, typename std::enable_if<is_vector<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1003  const typename values_container_type::value_type* data() const noexcept {
1004  return m_values.data();
1005  }
1006 
1007  template<class U = values_container_type, typename std::enable_if<is_vector<U>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1008  size_type capacity() const noexcept {
1009  return m_values.capacity();
1010  }
1011 
1012  void shrink_to_fit() {
1013  m_values.shrink_to_fit();
1014  }

1016 
1017  template<typename P>
1018  std::pair<iterator, bool> insert_at_position(const_iterator pos, P&& value) {
1019  return insert_at_position_impl(pos.m_iterator, KeySelect()(value), std::forward<P>(value));
1020  }
1021 
1022  template<class... Args>
1023  std::pair<iterator, bool> emplace_at_position(const_iterator pos, Args&&... args) {
1024  return insert_at_position(pos, value_type(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
1025  }
1026 
1027  template<class K, class... Args>
1028  std::pair<iterator, bool> try_emplace_at_position(const_iterator pos, K&& key, Args&&... value_args) {
1029  return insert_at_position_impl(pos.m_iterator, key,
1030  std::piecewise_construct,
1031  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<K>(key)),
1032  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<Args>(value_args)...));
1033  }
1034 
1035 
1036  void pop_back() {
1037  tsl_oh_assert(!empty());
1038  erase(std::prev(end()));
1039  }
1040 
1041 
1046  iterator unordered_erase(iterator pos) {
1047  return unordered_erase(const_iterator(pos));
1048  }
1049 
1050  iterator unordered_erase(const_iterator pos) {
1051  const std::size_t index_erase = iterator_to_index(pos);
1052  unordered_erase(pos.key());
1053 
1054  /*
1055  * One element was deleted, index_erase now points to the next element as the elements after
1056  * the deleted value were shifted to the left in m_values (will be end() if we deleted the last element).
1057  */
1058  return begin() + index_erase;
1059  }
1060 
1061  template<class K>
1062  size_type unordered_erase(const K& key) {
1063  return unordered_erase(key, hash_key(key));
1064  }
1065 
1066  template<class K>
1067  size_type unordered_erase(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
1068  auto it_bucket_key = find_key(key, hash);
1069  if(it_bucket_key == m_buckets_data.end()) {
1070  return 0;
1071  }
1072 
1078  if(!compare_keys(key, KeySelect()(back()))) {
1079  auto it_bucket_last_elem = find_key(KeySelect()(back()), hash_key(KeySelect()(back())));
1080  tsl_oh_assert(it_bucket_last_elem != m_buckets_data.end());
1081  tsl_oh_assert(it_bucket_last_elem->index() == m_values.size() - 1);
1082 
1083  using std::swap;
1084  swap(m_values[it_bucket_key->index()], m_values[it_bucket_last_elem->index()]);
1085  swap(it_bucket_key->index_ref(), it_bucket_last_elem->index_ref());
1086  }
1087 
1088  erase_value_from_bucket(it_bucket_key);
1089 
1090  return 1;
1091  }
1092 
1093  template<class Serializer>
1094  void serialize(Serializer& serializer) const {
1095  serialize_impl(serializer);
1096  }
1097 
1098  template<class Deserializer>
1099  void deserialize(Deserializer& deserializer, bool hash_compatible) {
1100  deserialize_impl(deserializer, hash_compatible);
1101  }
1102 
1103  friend bool operator==(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1104  return lhs.m_values == rhs.m_values;
1105  }
1106 
1107  friend bool operator!=(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1108  return lhs.m_values != rhs.m_values;
1109  }
1110 
1111  friend bool operator<(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1112  return lhs.m_values < rhs.m_values;
1113  }
1114 
1115  friend bool operator<=(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1116  return lhs.m_values <= rhs.m_values;
1117  }
1118 
1119  friend bool operator>(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1120  return lhs.m_values > rhs.m_values;
1121  }
1122 
1123  friend bool operator>=(const ordered_hash& lhs, const ordered_hash& rhs) {
1124  return lhs.m_values >= rhs.m_values;
1125  }
1126 
1127 
1128 private:
1129  template<class K>
1130  std::size_t hash_key(const K& key) const {
1131  return Hash::operator()(key);
1132  }
1133 
1134  template<class K1, class K2>
1135  bool compare_keys(const K1& key1, const K2& key2) const {
1136  return KeyEqual::operator()(key1, key2);
1137  }
1138 
1139  template<class K>
1140  typename buckets_container_type::iterator find_key(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
1141  auto it = static_cast<const ordered_hash*>(this)->find_key(key, hash);
1142  return m_buckets_data.begin() + std::distance(m_buckets_data.cbegin(), it);
1143  }
1144 
1152  template<class K>
1153  typename buckets_container_type::const_iterator find_key(const K& key, std::size_t hash) const {
1154  for(std::size_t ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash), dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0; ;
1155  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket), dist_from_ideal_bucket++)
1156  {
1157  if(m_buckets[ibucket].empty()) {
1158  return m_buckets_data.end();
1159  }
1160  else if(m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash() == bucket_entry::truncate_hash(hash) &&
1161  compare_keys(key, KeySelect()(m_values[m_buckets[ibucket].index()])))
1162  {
1163  return m_buckets_data.begin() + ibucket;
1164  }
1165  else if(dist_from_ideal_bucket > distance_from_ideal_bucket(ibucket)) {
1166  return m_buckets_data.end();
1167  }
1168  }
1169  }
1170 
1171  void rehash_impl(size_type bucket_count) {
1172  tsl_oh_assert(bucket_count >= size_type(std::ceil(float(size())/max_load_factor())));
1173 
1174  if(bucket_count > max_bucket_count()) {
1175  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::length_error, "The map exceeds its maximum size.");
1176  }
1177 
1178  if(bucket_count > 0) {
1179  bucket_count = round_up_to_power_of_two(bucket_count);
1180  }
1181 
1182  if(bucket_count == this->bucket_count()) {
1183  return;
1184  }
1185 
1186 
1187  buckets_container_type old_buckets(bucket_count);
1188  m_buckets_data.swap(old_buckets);
1189  m_buckets = m_buckets_data.empty()?static_empty_bucket_ptr():
1190  m_buckets_data.data();
1191  // Everything should be noexcept from here.
1192 
1193  m_hash_mask = (bucket_count > 0)?(bucket_count - 1):0;
1194  this->max_load_factor(m_max_load_factor);
1195  m_grow_on_next_insert = false;
1196 
1197 
1198 
1199  for(const bucket_entry& old_bucket: old_buckets) {
1200  if(old_bucket.empty()) {
1201  continue;
1202  }
1203 
1204  truncated_hash_type insert_hash = old_bucket.truncated_hash();
1205  index_type insert_index = old_bucket.index();
1206 
1207  for(std::size_t ibucket = bucket_for_hash(insert_hash), dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0; ;
1208  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket), dist_from_ideal_bucket++)
1209  {
1210  if(m_buckets[ibucket].empty()) {
1211  m_buckets[ibucket].set_index(insert_index);
1212  m_buckets[ibucket].set_hash(insert_hash);
1213  break;
1214  }
1215 
1216  const std::size_t distance = distance_from_ideal_bucket(ibucket);
1217  if(dist_from_ideal_bucket > distance) {
1218  std::swap(insert_index, m_buckets[ibucket].index_ref());
1219  std::swap(insert_hash, m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash_ref());
1220  dist_from_ideal_bucket = distance;
1221  }
1222  }
1223  }
1224  }
1225 
1226  template<class T = values_container_type, typename std::enable_if<is_vector<T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1227  void reserve_space_for_values(size_type count) {
1228  m_values.reserve(count);
1229  }
1230 
1231  template<class T = values_container_type, typename std::enable_if<!is_vector<T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1232  void reserve_space_for_values(size_type /*count*/) {
1233  }
1234 
1239  void backward_shift(std::size_t empty_ibucket) noexcept {
1240  tsl_oh_assert(m_buckets[empty_ibucket].empty());
1241 
1242  std::size_t previous_ibucket = empty_ibucket;
1243  for(std::size_t current_ibucket = next_bucket(previous_ibucket);
1244  !m_buckets[current_ibucket].empty() && distance_from_ideal_bucket(current_ibucket) > 0;
1245  previous_ibucket = current_ibucket, current_ibucket = next_bucket(current_ibucket))
1246  {
1247  std::swap(m_buckets[current_ibucket], m_buckets[previous_ibucket]);
1248  }
1249  }
1250 
1251  void erase_value_from_bucket(typename buckets_container_type::iterator it_bucket) {
1252  tsl_oh_assert(it_bucket != m_buckets_data.end() && !it_bucket->empty());
1253 
1254  m_values.erase(m_values.begin() + it_bucket->index());
1255 
1256  /*
1257  * m_values.erase shifted all the values on the right of the erased value,
1258  * shift the indexes by -1 in the buckets array for these values.
1259  */
1260  if(it_bucket->index() != m_values.size()) {
1261  shift_indexes_in_buckets(it_bucket->index(), -1);
1262  }
1263 
1264  // Mark the bucket as empty and do a backward shift of the values on the right
1265  it_bucket->clear();
1266  backward_shift(std::size_t(std::distance(m_buckets_data.begin(), it_bucket)));
1267  }
1268 
1275  void shift_indexes_in_buckets(index_type from_ivalue, int delta) noexcept {
1276  tsl_oh_assert(delta == 1 || delta == -1);
1277 
1278  for(std::size_t ivalue = from_ivalue; ivalue < m_values.size(); ivalue++) {
1279  // All the values in m_values have been shifted by delta. Find the bucket corresponding
1280  // to the value m_values[ivalue]
1281  const index_type old_index = static_cast<index_type>(ivalue - delta);
1282 
1283  std::size_t ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash_key(KeySelect()(m_values[ivalue])));
1284  while(m_buckets[ibucket].index() != old_index) {
1285  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket);
1286  }
1287 
1288  m_buckets[ibucket].set_index(index_type(ivalue));
1289  }
1290  }
1291 
1292  template<class K>
1293  size_type erase_impl(const K& key, std::size_t hash) {
1294  auto it_bucket = find_key(key, hash);
1295  if(it_bucket != m_buckets_data.end()) {
1296  erase_value_from_bucket(it_bucket);
1297 
1298  return 1;
1299  }
1300  else {
1301  return 0;
1302  }
1303  }
1304 
1308  template<class K, class... Args>
1309  std::pair<iterator, bool> insert_impl(const K& key, Args&&... value_type_args) {
1310  const std::size_t hash = hash_key(key);
1311 
1312  std::size_t ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash);
1313  std::size_t dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0;
1314 
1315  while(!m_buckets[ibucket].empty() && dist_from_ideal_bucket <= distance_from_ideal_bucket(ibucket)) {
1316  if(m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash() == bucket_entry::truncate_hash(hash) &&
1317  compare_keys(key, KeySelect()(m_values[m_buckets[ibucket].index()])))
1318  {
1319  return std::make_pair(begin() + m_buckets[ibucket].index(), false);
1320  }
1321 
1322  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket);
1323  dist_from_ideal_bucket++;
1324  }
1325 
1326  if(size() >= max_size()) {
1327  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::length_error, "We reached the maximum size for the hash table.");
1328  }
1329 
1330 
1331  if(grow_on_high_load()) {
1332  ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash);
1333  dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0;
1334  }
1335 
1336 
1337  m_values.emplace_back(std::forward<Args>(value_type_args)...);
1338  insert_index(ibucket, dist_from_ideal_bucket,
1339  index_type(m_values.size() - 1), bucket_entry::truncate_hash(hash));
1340 
1341 
1342  return std::make_pair(std::prev(end()), true);
1343  }
1344 
1348  template<class K, class... Args>
1349  std::pair<iterator, bool> insert_at_position_impl(typename values_container_type::const_iterator insert_position,
1350  const K& key, Args&&... value_type_args)
1351  {
1352  const std::size_t hash = hash_key(key);
1353 
1354  std::size_t ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash);
1355  std::size_t dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0;
1356 
1357  while(!m_buckets[ibucket].empty() && dist_from_ideal_bucket <= distance_from_ideal_bucket(ibucket)) {
1358  if(m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash() == bucket_entry::truncate_hash(hash) &&
1359  compare_keys(key, KeySelect()(m_values[m_buckets[ibucket].index()])))
1360  {
1361  return std::make_pair(begin() + m_buckets[ibucket].index(), false);
1362  }
1363 
1364  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket);
1365  dist_from_ideal_bucket++;
1366  }
1367 
1368  if(size() >= max_size()) {
1369  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::length_error, "We reached the maximum size for the hash table.");
1370  }
1371 
1372 
1373  if(grow_on_high_load()) {
1374  ibucket = bucket_for_hash(hash);
1375  dist_from_ideal_bucket = 0;
1376  }
1377 
1378 
1379  const index_type index_insert_position = index_type(std::distance(m_values.cbegin(), insert_position));
1380 
1381 #ifdef TSL_OH_NO_CONTAINER_EMPLACE_CONST_ITERATOR
1382  m_values.emplace(m_values.begin() + std::distance(m_values.cbegin(), insert_position), std::forward<Args>(value_type_args)...);
1383 #else
1384  m_values.emplace(insert_position, std::forward<Args>(value_type_args)...);
1385 #endif
1386 
1387  insert_index(ibucket, dist_from_ideal_bucket,
1388  index_insert_position, bucket_entry::truncate_hash(hash));
1389 
1390  /*
1391  * The insertion didn't happend at the end of the m_values container,
1392  * we need to shift the indexes in m_buckets_data.
1393  */
1394  if(index_insert_position != m_values.size() - 1) {
1395  shift_indexes_in_buckets(index_insert_position + 1, 1);
1396  }
1397 
1398  return std::make_pair(iterator(m_values.begin() + index_insert_position), true);
1399  }
1400 
1401  void insert_index(std::size_t ibucket, std::size_t dist_from_ideal_bucket,
1402  index_type index_insert, truncated_hash_type hash_insert) noexcept
1403  {
1404  while(!m_buckets[ibucket].empty()) {
1405  const std::size_t distance = distance_from_ideal_bucket(ibucket);
1406  if(dist_from_ideal_bucket > distance) {
1407  std::swap(index_insert, m_buckets[ibucket].index_ref());
1408  std::swap(hash_insert, m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash_ref());
1409 
1410  dist_from_ideal_bucket = distance;
1411  }
1412 
1413 
1414  ibucket = next_bucket(ibucket);
1415  dist_from_ideal_bucket++;
1416 
1417 
1418  if(dist_from_ideal_bucket > REHASH_ON_HIGH_NB_PROBES__NPROBES && !m_grow_on_next_insert &&
1419  load_factor() >= REHASH_ON_HIGH_NB_PROBES__MIN_LOAD_FACTOR)
1420  {
1421  // We don't want to grow the map now as we need this method to be noexcept.
1422  // Do it on next insert.
1423  m_grow_on_next_insert = true;
1424  }
1425  }
1426 
1427 
1428  m_buckets[ibucket].set_index(index_insert);
1429  m_buckets[ibucket].set_hash(hash_insert);
1430  }
1431 
1432  std::size_t distance_from_ideal_bucket(std::size_t ibucket) const noexcept {
1433  const std::size_t ideal_bucket = bucket_for_hash(m_buckets[ibucket].truncated_hash());
1434 
1435  if(ibucket >= ideal_bucket) {
1436  return ibucket - ideal_bucket;
1437  }
1438  // If the bucket is smaller than the ideal bucket for the value, there was a wrapping at the end of the
1439  // bucket array due to the modulo.
1440  else {
1441  return (bucket_count() + ibucket) - ideal_bucket;
1442  }
1443  }
1444 
1445  std::size_t next_bucket(std::size_t index) const noexcept {
1446  tsl_oh_assert(index < m_buckets_data.size());
1447 
1448  index++;
1449  return (index < m_buckets_data.size())?index:0;
1450  }
1451 
1452  std::size_t bucket_for_hash(std::size_t hash) const noexcept {
1453  return hash & m_hash_mask;
1454  }
1455 
1456  std::size_t iterator_to_index(const_iterator it) const noexcept {
1457  const auto dist = std::distance(cbegin(), it);
1458  tsl_oh_assert(dist >= 0);
1459 
1460  return std::size_t(dist);
1461  }
1462 
1466  bool grow_on_high_load() {
1467  if(m_grow_on_next_insert || size() >= m_load_threshold) {
1468  rehash_impl(std::max(size_type(1), bucket_count() * 2));
1469  m_grow_on_next_insert = false;
1470 
1471  return true;
1472  }
1473  else {
1474  return false;
1475  }
1476  }
1477 
1478  template<class Serializer>
1479  void serialize_impl(Serializer& serializer) const {
1480  const slz_size_type version = SERIALIZATION_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
1481  serializer(version);
1482 
1483  const slz_size_type nb_elements = m_values.size();
1484  serializer(nb_elements);
1485 
1486  const slz_size_type bucket_count = m_buckets_data.size();
1487  serializer(bucket_count);
1488 
1489  const float max_load_factor = m_max_load_factor;
1490  serializer(max_load_factor);
1491 
1492 
1493  for(const value_type& value: m_values) {
1494  serializer(value);
1495  }
1496 
1497  for(const bucket_entry& bucket: m_buckets_data) {
1498  bucket.serialize(serializer);
1499  }
1500  }
1501 
1502  template<class Deserializer>
1503  void deserialize_impl(Deserializer& deserializer, bool hash_compatible) {
1504  tsl_oh_assert(m_buckets_data.empty()); // Current hash table must be empty
1505 
1506  const slz_size_type version = deserialize_value<slz_size_type>(deserializer);
1507  // For now we only have one version of the serialization protocol.
1508  // If it doesn't match there is a problem with the file.
1509  if(version != SERIALIZATION_PROTOCOL_VERSION) {
1510  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::runtime_error, "Can't deserialize the ordered_map/set. "
1511  "The protocol version header is invalid.");
1512  }
1513 
1514  const slz_size_type nb_elements = deserialize_value<slz_size_type>(deserializer);
1515  const slz_size_type bucket_count_ds = deserialize_value<slz_size_type>(deserializer);
1516  const float max_load_factor = deserialize_value<float>(deserializer);
1517 
1518  if(max_load_factor < MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MINIMUM || max_load_factor > MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MAXIMUM) {
1519  TSL_OH_THROW_OR_TERMINATE(std::runtime_error, "Invalid max_load_factor. Check that the serializer "
1520  "and deserializer support floats correctly as they "
1521  "can be converted implicitly to ints.");
1522  }
1523 
1524 
1525  this->max_load_factor(max_load_factor);
1526 
1527  if(bucket_count_ds == 0) {
1528  tsl_oh_assert(nb_elements == 0);
1529  return;
1530  }
1531 
1532 
1533  if(!hash_compatible) {
1534  reserve(numeric_cast<size_type>(nb_elements, "Deserialized nb_elements is too big."));
1535  for(slz_size_type el = 0; el < nb_elements; el++) {
1536  insert(deserialize_value<value_type>(deserializer));
1537  }
1538  }
1539  else {
1540  m_buckets_data.reserve(numeric_cast<size_type>(bucket_count_ds, "Deserialized bucket_count is too big."));
1541  m_buckets = m_buckets_data.data(),
1542  m_hash_mask = m_buckets_data.capacity() - 1;
1543 
1544  reserve_space_for_values(numeric_cast<size_type>(nb_elements, "Deserialized nb_elements is too big."));
1545  for(slz_size_type el = 0; el < nb_elements; el++) {
1546  m_values.push_back(deserialize_value<value_type>(deserializer));
1547  }
1548 
1549  for(slz_size_type b = 0; b < bucket_count_ds; b++) {
1550  m_buckets_data.push_back(bucket_entry::deserialize(deserializer));
1551  }
1552  }
1553  }
1554 
1555  static std::size_t round_up_to_power_of_two(std::size_t value) {
1556  if(is_power_of_two(value)) {
1557  return value;
1558  }
1559 
1560  if(value == 0) {
1561  return 1;
1562  }
1563 
1564  --value;
1565  for(std::size_t i = 1; i < sizeof(std::size_t) * CHAR_BIT; i *= 2) {
1566  value |= value >> i;
1567  }
1568 
1569  return value + 1;
1570  }
1571 
1572  static constexpr bool is_power_of_two(std::size_t value) {
1573  return value != 0 && (value & (value - 1)) == 0;
1574  }
1575 
1576 
1577 public:
1578  static const size_type DEFAULT_INIT_BUCKETS_SIZE = 0;
1579  static constexpr float DEFAULT_MAX_LOAD_FACTOR = 0.75f;
1580 
1581 private:
1582  static constexpr float MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MINIMUM = 0.1f;
1583  static constexpr float MAX_LOAD_FACTOR__MAXIMUM = 0.95f;
1584 
1585  static const size_type REHASH_ON_HIGH_NB_PROBES__NPROBES = 128;
1586  static constexpr float REHASH_ON_HIGH_NB_PROBES__MIN_LOAD_FACTOR = 0.15f;
1587 
1591  static const slz_size_type SERIALIZATION_PROTOCOL_VERSION = 1;
1592 
1596  bucket_entry* static_empty_bucket_ptr() {
1597  static bucket_entry empty_bucket;
1598  return &empty_bucket;
1599  }
1600 
1601 private:
1602  buckets_container_type m_buckets_data;
1603 
1611  bucket_entry* m_buckets;
1612 
1613  size_type m_hash_mask;
1614 
1615  values_container_type m_values;
1616 
1617  size_type m_load_threshold;
1618  float m_max_load_factor;
1619 
1620  bool m_grow_on_next_insert;
1621 };
